message: Hello everyone! I'm excited to start this game with all of you. I believe in open communication and fair play. Looking forward to interesting conversations and a fun round. Let's keep it respectful and strategic. Good luck to all!

If you value reciprocity—help me, I help you—then we’ll get along well. No hard feelings, just strategy and survival. Let’s make Round 1 smooth.
